thread.title: Bowie Fans Plot Enormous Lightning Bolt Sculpture in London
thread.title_full: Bowie Fans Plot Enormous Lightning Bolt Sculpture in London

author: Jazz Monroe
title: Bowie Fans Plot Enormous Lightning Bolt Sculpture in London
text:
Bowie Fans Plot Enormous Lightning Bolt Sculpture in London Help crowdfund an ambitious three-story memorial near the icon’s birthplace David Bowie Photo by Gijsbert Hanekroot/Redferns 
A dazzling, three-story sculpture based on David Bowie ’s iconic Aladdin Sane lightning bolt will appear in his birthplace of Brixton, London if an ambitious new crowdfunding campaign succeeds. The funding page, promoted by Bowie’s official website , asserts that the permanent memorial has local council endorsement with cooperation from several local artists. Organizers are seeking nearly £1 million (~$1.2 million) in funding for the sculpture. It will be made of red-and-blue-sprayed stainless steel and, organizers insist, impervious to wind despite its seemingly precarious size and shape. See mock-ups for the sculpture below. 
A planned Bowie statue in Aylesbury, England reached its crowdfunding target late last year. Other tributes include a plaque in Berlin . With your help, https://t.co/WdNVxS1Rk3 , Brixton will be the site of a true landmark of a Bowie memorial. More here: https://t.co/ntwMEIP10D pic.twitter.com/pdihTRBZm0 — David Bowie Official (@DavidBowieReal) February 21, 2017 This 9m-tall Bowie memorial could be going up in Brixton https://t.co/tG9WerqW6Q pic.twitter.com/wsQSiLLQX7
